parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set camera shake parameters. 
Will not have any effect until shake is started via [[addCamShake]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setCamShakeParams'''  [posCoef, vertCoef, horzCoef, bankCoef, interpolation] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> posCoef: [[Number]] - Strength of positional movement (how far the whole position can change in X,Y&Z), should not be bigger than .1, or the camera might move into, or behind, the player </value></part><part><name>Parameter1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vertCoef: [[Number]] - Strength of vertical camera pan (up/down), practical range: 0-10 </value></part><part><name>Parameter2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> horzCoef: [[Number]] - Strength of horizontal camera pan (left/right), practical range: 0-10 </value></part><part><name>Parameter3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> bankCoef: [[Number]] - Strength of camera tilt/bank, practical range: 0-20 </value></part><part><name>Parameter4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> interpolation: [[Boolean]] - If [[true]], then transitions in the different shaking directions will be smoother </value></part><part><name>Parameter5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[setCamShakeParams]] [0.1, 1, 1, 1, true]; </code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setCamShakeDefParams]], [[addCamShake]], [[enableCamShake]], [[resetCamShake]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
